description: Refurbishment and alterations to 320/326 City Road and use as offices (12 000 sq.ft.);new 3 storey infill building between 326 and 328 City Road and new 3 and 4 storey buildings with basement parking fronting Hall Street and to rear for office use (approximately 76 000 sq. ft. net)in up to 31 small buildings and 3 storey buildings fronting Goswell Road and Wakley Street for light industrial use (approximately 29 000 sq. ft. net) in up to 5 units (as amplified by schedule received 04.03.85 and report dated 08.03.85 and revised by letter and drawings of 04.06.85). (APPLICANTS PLAN NOS: 1050/10  1050/12  1050/13  1050/14 1050/15  1050/16  1050/30  1050/31  1050/32  1050/33 1050/34  1050/35 & 1050/01)
decision_conditions: To encourage early development and to comply with the provisions of Section 41(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1971.
